data.persona: I am but a peasant.  The king looks down on us.  I barely eat.  I wish I had a job.
data.description:
You are in the Horse field.
The horse field includes a huge plains for horses to ride. The fields are yellow and green. The place smells of musk and horse.
There's a bale, a horse, and a pitchfork here.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a rock.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the thief so that the thief does not get away.
data.mid_motivation: I am watching over the horses at the horse field in exchange for some food and shelter.
data.long_motivation: I will work hard in the Horse Field so that I can have a permanent job and not have to worry about my meals.
